Title: Provides for the applicability of provisions governing referral of certain municipal planning and zoning actions to counties operating under a county charter
Summary: Provides for the applicability of provisions governing referral of certain municipal planning and zoning actions to county planning agencies or regional planning councils to all counties, including counties operating under a county charter, except counties wholly contained within a city.
LawCode: Amd ยง239-m, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the referral of certain proposed city, town, and village planning and zoning actions to the county planning agency or regional planning council
